traceId.description: An unique message identifier - UUID v4

transmitId.description: Unique identifier (UUID v4) for set of commands passed back and forth. Groups results with command lists.

eventTimestamp.description: Timestamp for the time the command list was generated. UTC in RFC3339 format.

deviceId.description: Unique device identifier. Unique for local system (in bus)

apduType.description: Type of card for APDU commands. Either desfire or iso7816

commandId.description: Incremental number denoting what command it is in a specific sequence.

expStatus.description: Expected prefix status as first returned bytes.

command.description: List of results to specific commands denoted by commandId and base64 encoded buffered commands.
